text: 露珠昨天夜里，谁从草地上走过？丢了那么多的珍珠。今天早上，谁在草丛中看着我？还打湿了我的衣裤。太阳升高了，谁收走了珍珠？留下了湿湿的气息，湿湿的泥土。
translation:
Last night,
Who walked up from the meadow?
[They] lost so many pearls.
This morning,
Who was watching me from the underbrush?
[They] made damp my trousers.
The sun is high,
who left with the pearls?
[They] left behind them dewy breath,
and wet soil.
pinyin: lùzhū zuótiān yèli shéi cóng cǎodì shàng zǒuguò diū le nàme duō de zhēnzhū jīntiān zǎoshang shéi zài cǎocóng zhōngkàn zháo wǒ hái dǎ shī le wǒ de yì kù tàiyang shēnggāo le shéi shōu zǒu le zhēnzhū liúxià le shī shī de qìxī shī shī de nítǔ
